vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.8;
son of: Koz (H6976);
brother of: Anub (H6036) and Zobebah (H6637);
father of: Aharhel (H0316)
§ Harum = "exalted"
a man of Judah, father of Aharhel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Aharhel; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈崙 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "被尊崇的"
猶大的後裔 (代上 4:8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈仑 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "被尊崇的"
犹大的后裔 (代上 4:8)
